Name Rascal/Libraries/LabeledGraph/predecessors

Synopsis Determine the set of direct predecessors of a node in a labeled graph.
Function set[&T] predecessors(LGraph[&T] G, &T From)
Description Returns the direct predecessors of node From in LabeledGraph G.
Examples 
rascal>import LabeledGraph;
ok
rascal>predecessors({<1,"A",2>, <1,"B",3>, <2,"C",4>, <3,"D",4>}, 4);
set[int]: {3,2}
